maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Kind of breaks the atmosphere, doesn't it?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Ça casse un peu l'atmosphère, non ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: We're not here to have a good time, Shizuka.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: On est pas là pour passer un bon moment, Shizuka.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: So... you are now an Evotar.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Donc... maintenant tu es un Évotar.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Can you move around freely in the Playground?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Est-ce que tu peux te déplacer librement sur le Terrain de jeu ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: No... These days I am confined within this building.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Non... En ce moment je suis confiné dans ce bâtiment.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: That is also why I know little of what is happening outside.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: C'est aussi pour cela que je ne sais pas grand-chose de ce qu'il se passe en dehors.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Are you aware that Lea... has been in Evotarground again recently?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Est-ce que tu es au courant que Lea... a été sur le Terrain des Évotars récemment ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: I suspected it from some protocol readings I had access to.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Je le soupçonnais en regardant des logs auquel j'avais accès.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.note: protokoll = logs, might be a german confusion, but not going to fix the original text

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: I suppose they tried to drag Lea back into it?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Je suppose qu'ils ont essayés d'y ramener Lea de force ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Yes. And once she was there they could effectively track our connection.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui. Et une fois qu'elle était là-bas, ils pouvaient tracer la connexion entre nous deux.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: They almost managed to locate me.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Ils ont presque réussi à me localiser.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: That means Sidwell is already fully aware of your actions. This is troublesome.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Cela veut dire que Sidwell est déjà au courant de ce que tu fais. C'est assez problématique.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Something else I wonder... How did Lea learn the truth about herself?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Quelque chose d'autre me turlupine... Comment Lea a appris la vérité à propos d'elle-même ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: You do not know?\. Your little sister paid us a visit.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Tu n'es pas au courant ?\. Ta petite soeur nous a rendu visite.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: You did?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: T'as fait quoi ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: She confronted Lea with the truth... very abruptly.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Elle lui a balancé la vérité en pleine figure... assez abruptement.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Not again...
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Encore ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: I don't see the problem. I merely told her the truth.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Je vois pas vraiment où est le problème. Je lui ai simplement dit la vérité.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: You know full well what consequences your actions could have had!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Tu sais très bien quelles conséquences tes actions auraient pu avoir !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Well it happened, we can't change it now.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Mais bon, ce qui est fait est fait, on ne peut plus rien y faire maintenant.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: I'm glad that Lea was strong enough to overcome it this time around.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Je suis content que cette fois, Lea ait été suffisamment forte pour avoir surmonté ça.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Yes, congratulations, Lea.\. We're all so very proud of you.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, félicitation, Lea.\. On est tous fiers de toi.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Shizuka, stop acting like a child.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Shizuka, arrête de te comporter comme un enfant.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Excuse me?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Excuse-moi ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: You never stopped acting like a freak!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Tu n'as jamais arrêté de te comporter comme un maniaque !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Only caring for your dear little AI sister!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Toujours en t'occupant que de ta chère petite sœur IA !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: ENOUGH ALREADY!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: ÇA SUFFIT MAINTENANT !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Look, I know you have your issues with Lea.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Shizuka, je sais que tu as des problèmes avec Lea.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: But you need to understand one thing.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Mais tu dois comprendre une chose.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: She is our best chance to get out of this mess. Both of us.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Elle est notre meilleure chance de nous sortir d'ici. Pour nous deux.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: What do you mean?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Qu'est-ce que tu veux dire ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: It's thanks to her that we got in contact with Sergey.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: C'est grâce à elle qu'on a pu contacter Sergey.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Not only that, but she's the only one who can reach the \c[3]Evotar Server\c[0].
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Non seulement ça, mais c'est aussi la seule à pouvoir atteindre le \c[3]Serveur des Évotars\c[0].

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Why is now the first time I hear of this?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Pourquoi c'est seulement maintenant que j'apprends ça ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: I couldn't share this with you or anybody else.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Je pouvais pas le dire, à toi ou à n'importe qui d'autre.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: We're all being monitored, it would have jeopardized the whole plan.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: On est tous surveillés, ça aurait compromis tout mon stratagème.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Anyway.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: En tout cas...

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: With both Sergey's and Lea's help, we might be able to get everyone out of this.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Avec l'aide de Sergey et Lea, on pourra peut-être essayer de tous sortir de là.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: You, me...\. maybe even Gautham.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Toi, moi...\. peut-être Même Gautham.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: The crime rate has developed quite unfavorably recently.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Le taux de criminalité à très fortement progressé récemment.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: It has. And at the same time, we're lacking in manpower.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui. Et au même moment, on manque de personnel.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: If this continues, I'm not sure we can keep protecting our citizens.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Si cela continue, je ne suis pas sûr que l'on puisse continuer à protéger nos citoyens.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Sad, but true...
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: C'est triste, mais c'est vrai...

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: I hear they discovered a new entrance to the temple in the mountains.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: J'ai entendu qu'ils ont découvert une nouvelle entrée du temple dans les montagnes.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Oh! Do you think we can still find new treasure in there?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oh ! Tu penses qu'on pourra y trouver de nouveaux trésors ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Definitely, but we have to hurry! Everybody is no preparing to enter the place, soon!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Surement, mais il faut se dépêcher ! Tout le monde doit être en train de se préparer pour rentrer !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Right, we should start preparations at once!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, il faut commencer les préparations dès maintenant !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: We Shad a very noble folks, related to Ancients!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Nous Shad être très nobles, liés avec Anciens !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but we have trouble with Human tongue!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, mais nous avoir problème avec langue Humain !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but that because human tongue really trouble some. Too many word and weird rules!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, mais parce que langue humaine très compliquée. Trop de mots et règles tordues !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: So true! We should help human make language simple!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Si vrai ! Nous devoir aider humain faire langage simple !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Great idea!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Super idée !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: The stocks have been rather good this week.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Le marché à l'air de se porter bien cette semaine.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Very much, I made a good fortune.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, j'ai gagné une petite fortune.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Speculation and stuff.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Avec de la spéculation et tout.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Business, business.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Affaires, Affaires.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Privatize everything!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Privatisez tout !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Isn't the weather just fantastic today?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Le temps n'est-il pas fantastique aujourd'hui ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Indeed! The sun is shining, it's fantastic, the best!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, le soleil brille, c'est fantastique, ça ne peut pas être mieux !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Let's all go out and play!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Allons dehors pour s'amuser !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Yes, let's go out and play!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, on joue dehors !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Plaaay!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Jeuuuu !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: But before that I have to finish work.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Mais avant ça je dois finir mes devoirs.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Awwwww...
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oh, nooooon...

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: I hear they discovered a new entrance to the temple in the mountains.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: J'ai entendu qu'ils ont découvert une nouvelle entrée du temple dans les montagnes.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Oh! Do you think we can still find new treasure in there?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oh ! Tu penses qu'on pourra y trouver de nouveaux trésors ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Definitely, but we have to hurry! Everybody is no preparing to enter the place, soon!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Surement, mais il faut se dépêcher ! Tout le monde doit être en train de se préparer pour rentrer !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Right, we should start preparations at once!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, il faut commencer les préparations dès maintenant !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: The crime rate has developed quite unfavorably recently.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Le taux de criminalité à très fortement progressé récemment.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: It has. And at the same time, we're lacking in manpower.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui. Et au même moment, on manque de personnel.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: If this continues, I'm not sure we can keep protecting our citizens.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Si cela continue, je ne suis pas sûr que l'on puisse continuer à protéger nos citoyens.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Sad, but true...
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: C'est triste, mais c'est vrai...

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: The stocks have been rather good this week.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Le marché à l'air de se porter bien cette semaine.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Very much, I made a good fortune.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, j'ai gagné une petite fortune.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Speculation and stuff.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Avec de la spéculation et tout.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Business, business.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Affaires, Affaires.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Privatize everything!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Privatisez tout !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: We Shad a very noble folks, related to Ancients!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Nous Shad être très nobles, liés avec Anciens !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but we have trouble with Human tongue!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, mais nous avoir problème avec langue Humain !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but that because human tongue really trouble some. Too many word and weird rules!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Oui, mais parce que langue humaine très compliquée. Trop de mots et règles tordues !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: So true! We should help human make language simple!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Si vrai ! Nous devoir aider humain faire langage simple !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Great idea!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Super idée !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: For Shizuka and Gautham there might have been a slim chance to escape this whole mess.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Pour Shizuka et Gautham, il y avait peut-être une chance de s'en sortir.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: But for me...\. it was close to impossible.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Mais pour moi...\. c'était presque impossible.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: However now that Lea is here, things have changed.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Mais maintenant que Lea est ici, cela change tout.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Because she has an \c[3]access key embedded\c[0], she can reach the Evotar Server.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Parce qu'elle a une \c[3]clef d'accès intégrée\c[0], elle peut atteindre le Serveur des Évotars.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Come again?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Euh, comment ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Why does Lea have the key out of all people?
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Pourquoi est-ce que Lea aurait la clef, et pas vous ?

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Because...\. I tricked Sidwell into giving it to her.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Parce que...\. J'ai feinté Sidwell pour qu'il lui la donne.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Oh yes...\. that data corruption.\. What the heck.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Ah oui...\. La base de donnée corrompue.\. Bon sang.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: You really did not go easy on me.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Tu m'as pas rendu la vie facile.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: I had to make sure that not just anyone could fix it.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Il fallait que je sois sûr que n'importe qui ne puisse pas réparer cela.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: And it worked.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Et ça a marché.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Honestly...\. all of this was a huge gamble.\. But here you are.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Honnêtement...\. tout cela était un pari énorme.\. Mais, au final, tu es là.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: You received my message and found me.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Tu as reçu mon message et tu m'as retrouvé.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: And now...\. we need to figure out how Lea can reach the Evotar Server before Sidwell has a chance to wipe its data.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Et maintenant...\. il faut trouver un moyen pour que Lea puisse atteindre le serveur des Évotars avant que Sidwell puisse effacer toutes les données.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: And I already have a few ideas I'd like to discuss with you in detail, Sergey.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Et j'ai déjà quelques idées dont je voudrais bien discuter avec toi en détail, Sergey.

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Of course!
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Bien sûr !

maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.orig: Let's relocate back to the previous room.
maps/hideout/inner-garden.json/entities/.text: Revenons dans la pièce précédente.
